title: Inquiry-Based Mathematics Teaching-Learning Design and Curriculum Alignment Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: An environment where students design and solve inquiry-based problems, emphasizing teacher-student interaction

learning_goals: Students can generate three or more inquiry-based questions by applying an inquiry-based learning model to solve mathematical problems
Learners can analyze data collected during the inquiry process to derive valid mathematical conclusions and document them in written reports
Participants can self-assess using a 5-level rubric standard by evaluating the alignment between curriculum objectives and inquiry activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
